CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 8 - Right to respect for private and family life (Article 8-1 - Respect for family life)

In particular , the applicant stated that he was ethnically NORP , had no connection with GPE and that his wife and child , as well as his brother and parents , were NORP nationals residing in GPE . He was the family breadwinner and his exclusion would entail distress and financial hardship for his wife and son .
